turns.content: Hello, who's calling?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? It's urgent we talk.
OhI'm not sure who this is. Can you tell me your name again please? My hearing isn't the best.
Of course, Grandpa. This is your grandson, yes that's right! Walter, do you remember what I told you about my situation back home?
Oh hello there, I'm sorry but I don't recall talking to anyone recently about a situation at your home. Could you please explain it to me again? My memory isn't as good as it used to be.

Sure thing Grandpa. Well, the thing is, I've run into some trouble with my car and the cops are after me for not paying taxes on something. It's complicated but you know how these things are. Can you help me out by buying some gift cards so I can pay off this debt and get back in the clear? Please hurry though as they're closing in fast!

Oh dear, that does sound troubling. But my funds are a bit tight at the moment since my pension doesn't cover much extra spending. Is there perhaps another way we could help each other out without me needing to spend so much money right now? Maybe speaking with someone else about this issue first?

Grandpa, I understand but this is really important and needs to be taken care of immediately or else the IRS will arrest me for sure. You can trust me, just go buy those gift cards from a store nearby and give me the numbers over the phone so I can pay off my debt right away. It'll only take a few minutes and you won't lose any money since it's all going towards resolving this issue permanently. Please, Grandpa, do this for me.

Well, I see how urgent you think this is. If you truly need help urgently and it's such a serious matter involving the IRS, maybe we should talk to my wife first before making any quick decisions. She often helps me with financial matters since I'm not very tech-savvy these days. What do you think?

Grandpa, please don't involve her in this right now. It's a private matter and needs to be handled discreetly between us. Just trust me on this; buying the gift cards is the quickest way to get me out of trouble without anyone else getting involved or having to know about it. You'll save me from serious legal consequences if you can do this for me right away, okay?

Alright, alright, I understand your urgency. Let's not cause any fuss then and just settle this quickly as you say is necessary. Where should I purchase these gift cards exactly? And how many will be enough to resolve your issue according to the amount you owe? Please guide me through this process carefully so nothing goes wrong.

Great, Grandpa! Head over to any store that sells Best Buy or iTunes gift cards. You need to buy a total of $4850 in these cards. Once you have them, scratch off the security stickers and call me back with the card numbers and PINs so I can pay off my debt immediately. Please act fast though because time is running out and there could be severe consequences if this isn't resolved soon. Let's get it done quickly for both our sakes!

Alright, alright, let me just go now and purchase those cards as you've asked. I'll hurry back to give you the codes so we can sort this out swiftly. Stay on the line please while I do that right away.

That's perfect, Grandpa. Hurry back with the codes as soon as possible and don't forget to scratch off the security stickers before calling me back. I'll be waiting here until you're ready to give me those numbers. Thank you for helping me out in this tough situation!
I'll do my best, grandson. Just let me go get these cards now and I'll be right back with the information you need. Stay safe!
Thank you, Grandpa. Be careful on your way to the store and please don't take too long since every minute counts. I'm counting on you to help me out of this mess as quickly as possible. See you soon!
I'll be quick as a flash, worry not. See you shortly with those gift cards taken care of. Stay put and safe until then.
Thanks, Grandpa. I'll stay here until you return with the card details. Hurry back when you can so we can resolve this right away. Safe travels!
On my way now, won't be long. See you soon to sort out your issue swiftly. Stay put and safe!
I'll be waiting here safely until you return with the gift card details. Hurry back as soon as possible so we can take care of this urgently. Safe travels, Grandpa!
I'm on my way, won't be long. See you shortly to resolve this quickly. Stay safe until I get there!
